failures.note: Clario is a privately held company (owned by Nordic Capital/Astorg). There is no public equity to trade to capture the merger spread. The ticker 'CLRS' appears to be a placeholder or error.

thesis_assessment.framework_view: Merger arbitrage requires a public target to execute the spread capture. As a private acquisition, this event offers no direct trading opportunity under this archetype.

lessons_learned: Always verify if the target in a merger is public or private.
Placeholders in event datasets can mimic tickers; verification is essential.
